## Description
&#10;&#9;&#9;Sodium Hypochlorite is&#10;&#9;&#9;one of the bleaching chemical for sanitizing soybean as well as pulp&#10;&#9;&#9;bleaching during paper making 

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|false|
|Type:|Chemical|
|Form:|Liquid|
